title: Germany to Stop Paying for Virus Tests for People Choosing to Stay Unvaccinated
content:
1. Germany to Stop Paying for Virus Tests for People Choosing to Stay Unvaccinated  The New York Times
  2. Germany abolishes free COVID-19 tests, seven people rescued in Turkey floodwaters | 9 News Australia  9 News Australia
  3. Nearly 9,000 people in Germany have to be vaccinated again after a nurse swapped vaccines for salt water  Business Insider
  4. German officials to discuss COVID-19 testing and flooding aid at summit  euronews
  5. Germany Ends Free Covid Testing to Prod People to Get Vaccinated  Bloomberg
